entries.npc_reset_2: If you think you're up to it later, check back and try again.
entries.npc_reset_1: If you think you're up to it later, check back and try again.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.otherescort_2: I hope you find the person you're looking for soon.
entries.npc_failure_2: I take it you ran into some unforeseen difficulties along the way? Well, I guess we'll find someone else to finish him off.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Give me a few minutes to find out where his next meeting is supposed to be. See me again shortly.
entries.npc_work_2: Were you going to extinguish that traitor any time soon?
entries.npc_reward_2: Black Sun can find further use for you. Speak with Zekka Thyne, my superior. I'll let him know about you.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Are you going to ice that traitor or not?
entries.npc_4_2: The lesson would be: Betraying Black Sun means certain death. Will you make that clear to him?
entries.npc_3_2: Most people prefer not to say
to me. You've got guts, I'll give you that.
entries.npc_2_2: Good. You'll meet him in the place where he meets his usual contact. His name is Dev Breeger -- not that it matters any more.
entries.npc_1_2: We've had a double agent in the Lady Hutt's organization for some time now. It turns out that he's been selling information about Black Sun to her. That's the problem with double agents -- you just can't trust them. Would you teach him a lesson for us?
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_dropoff_1: They never let you go completely. This may be you one day.
entries.npc_takeme_1: I'll go with you, I don't want this to get any worse.
entries.npc_breech_1: You must be the one Black Sun sent to get me.
entries.dontknowyou_1: My business is not with you.
entries.otherescort_1: My business is not with you.
entries.npc_failure_1: I had high hopes for you. I'm sorry this didn't work out.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I need to take an important call. See me in a while and we can get started.
entries.npc_work_1: Have you found Hammond Ballater yet?
entries.npc_reward_1: Good job. See me again if you need more work.
entries.npc_4_1: Right now I need information from someone who used to work for us but now works for Shalera -- the Lady Hutt, as she's known hereabouts. He hasn't been cooperative. Could you find him and bring him here?
entries.npc_3_1: You should get out of here before you become a liability.
entries.npc_2_1: Welcome to the organization. Go and find Hammond Ballater and bring him to me. He knows better than to think that Black Sun would let him go completely.
entries.npc_1_1: Black Sun is definitely the outfit to get involved with. We have our hand in everything from gambling to smuggling. Are you interested in working for Black Sun?
entries.npc_reset: If you think you're up to it later, check back and try again.
entries.cantwork: You can't work for me if you're working for someone else.
entries.next: You've been a big help. If you want to get more involved with Black Sun you should speak with Zekka Thyne.
